admission_text:
Join Us! A membership to the Art Center of Battle Creek is your ticket to creativity, exciting events, and exclusive benefits. We need your help to continually open the door each day to new and rewarding discoveries in the world of art in our community. Our members are our strength!

Support the Art Center of Battle Creek and enjoy exclusive membership privileges:

*free admission to the Art Center  
*exclusive members only events  
*reduced class and event fees  
*early registration for classes  
*10% off all Gift Gallery purchases  
*first notice of all exhibitions and special events  
*newsletter and calendar mailings  
*open studio access

Our corporate partners benefit from recognition for contributing to the community through their support of the Art Center receiving acknowledgement in a full year of program books, as well as an array of other benefits.

For more information on how to support the ACBC, please contact Linda at 269-962-9511 or director@artcenterofbattlecreek.com.

SEE BELOW FOR ONLINE & DOWNLOADABLE MEMBERSHIP FORMS

Annual Membership dues:

**Student/Teacher Membership: $20**  
(Students 18 or younger only)

  * One student/teacher membership card
  * Newsletters
  * All mailings of classes and events
  * Discounts on classes

**Basic Individual Membership: $35  
****($28 Seniors)**

  * One individual membership card
  * Discounts on classes and selected programs
  * 10% discount on purchases from the gift shop
  * Receive Art Center mailings, invitatio...
